story.title: Story: NHSERS-1335 SDS API For calculating business function codes

narrative.inOrderTo: use other ERS services that require an NHS person's business function codes
narrative.iWantTo: use the SDS API service to retrieve an NHS Person's business function codes from their job code

scenario.title: NHSERS-1335_S001 | Successful retrieval of function codes for an existing NHS person
